feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:39AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER ELEVATED... The Salmon River has been rising since Sunday due to warm temperatures at elevation causing snow melt into the basin and a likely release from Summit Lake. The rate of rise is starting to slow and a crest is likely today. However, inherent uncertainty in these events result in varying crest height and timing issues.
